30c9e938-e38c-49ca-925e-c799344bb7ee.body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<meta charset="utf-8">
<script src="/dev-latest.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="./styles.css">
<script>
	yozo.register('/file/click-counter.yz');
</script>
<title>Click counter</title>

<click-counter amount="0"></click-counter>

<button onclick="this.previousElementSibling.reset()">
	.reset()
</button>

2eba766f-231c-4ab8-a6b9-8db1ce031f3e.body:
<title>click-counter</title>
<meta attribute="amount" type="number">
<meta method="reset">

<template mode="closed">
	<button @click="$.increment()">
		clicks: {{ $.amount }}
	</button>
</template>
<script>
$.increment = () => {
	$.amount += 1;
};
$.reset = () => {
	$.amount = 0;
};
</script>
<style>
button {
	padding: .75rem 1.5rem;
	border: none;
	font-size: 1rem;
	line-height: 1.5;
	border-radius: .75rem;
	color: #181823;
	background-color: #FFB86C;
	cursor: pointer;
}
</style>
